recipesJson.name: Sesame cream balls
recipesJson.author: Tootall
recipesJson.description: Just a delicious simple cream filled sesame dough balls or sesame dough balls dipped in a thick vanilla cream?? Whatever it is its delicious in vape form. I used .35% flavorah sweetness feel free to use or don't use your preferred sweetener of choice. I dont think anything else in this recipe needs explaining its Just a good vape and simple and easy to make.

reviews.text: This is really good! At first it was a little harsh so I let it sit for an extra week and it smoothed out a lot. Thank you for another delicious recipe!
